trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The krasis can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The krasis makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.
